scripts.build-client: cd client && npm run build && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build-server: cd server && npm run build && npm prune
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run compile-server" "npm run server" "npm run client "
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
